templatesNew.template: Congrats! You've cleared the DC and have acquired the role **%rngrole** enjoy!
Winner Winner Chicken Dinner, you've acquired the role **%rngrole**!
It's time for some randomization! You've hit a nat 100! You and %guildrange users around you get new colours!
Looks like you didn't clear the DC, better luck next time. (%roll+%bonus=%total against %dc | %timeremaining)
You still need to wait before you can roll again! (%timeremaining)
Looks like this server doesn't have any lotto- roles configured, tell your admin to add some!
Hold on a sec, looks like I don't have access to Manage Roles, your admin should fix that!
Oh, looks like you've won, but it seems that the lotto- roles are above my permission level.
Lucky you, you rolled a zero but I can't remove your colours due to at permission issue, hopefully your admin notices this. (%roll+%bonus=%total against %dc | %timeremaining)

helptext: Try and roll for a coloured role
